claim: Palliative care was consulted early during the admission due to exquisitely painful ulcerations in his intertriginous areas and flank (Figure 1).
title: Figure 1:
caption: Photographs of the patient’s clinical findings including A) Necrotic ulcer with eschar formation and surrounding induration in the right mid-axillary line near the flank; B) close up of anterior chest wall lesion pictured in (A); and C) posterior aspect of right flank.
